title: About me
description: Hey, I'm {{config.owner.fullName}}, a fourth-year Bachelor's student of Computer Science at Inholland University of Applied Sciences in Haarlem, The Netherlands. I have a passion for problem solving and like to dive deep into complex issues. I'm always eager to learn new things and improve my skills.

I have experience with various programming languages and technologies, such as Java, C#, TypeScript, Python, and (No)SQL. I'm also familiar with frameworks and libraries like React, Spring Boot, ASP.NET, and TensorFlow and I know how to build websites using php, html, vue and WordPress. I'm currently working on expanding my knowledge of CI/CD and Cloud Computing.

backendDevelopment.title: Backend Development
backendDevelopment.description: Building backend systems and API's for various applications

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Developing functional websites built with modern technologies.

artificialIntelligence.title: Artificial Intelligence
artificialIntelligence.description: Creating both machine and deep learning AI models.

gaming.title: Gaming
gaming.description: Besides programming, I love playing videogames and to connect with gamers online.

lardyVanDerPal.name: Lardy van der Pal
description: Luuk demonstrates excellent self-management skills. He works independently, with a focus on results, and remains composed under pressure in critical situations. His entrepreneurial mindset and willingness to take initiative are remarkable.

In terms of social and communication skills, Luuk excels. He collaborates effectively in a team environment, communicates clearly with colleagues at various levels, and is open to feedback. His ability to listen and transfer knowledge is highly valued.

Luuk possesses creativity and problem-solving abilities. He makes well-considered decisions and regularly comes up with innovative ideas. Additionally, he shows a strong sense of social responsibility and interacts respectfully with diversity.

In summary, I have found working with Luuk to be a very pleasant experience. His dedication, excellent communication skills, and positive attitude make him a valuable colleague who contributes significantly to both the quality of work and a pleasant working atmosphere.

tayamElJebari.name: Tayam El Jebari
tayamElJebari.position: Fellow student | DevOps Engineer bij Albert Heijn
description: I have enjoyed working with Luuk. Luuk has a good ability to take initiative in various tasks and has a serious approach with his responsibilities.

His communication skills are excellent, which always makes cooperation within the team run smoothly. His dedication and diligence always leads to a clear structure in his code. Luuk is also an upbeat and fun colleague to work with. His positive attitude contributes to a pleasant working atmosphere.
